section.para: The Controller class.
Defines the Controller class that contains the main functionality of the spell checker.

section.title: addMask()

entry.para: The complete input given by the user

section.programlisting: 00087 def addMask(self, input): 00088 """! Replaces the [*] contained input with a mask from the tokeniser. 00089 @param input The complete input given by the user 00090 """ 00091 mask = self.tokenizer.mask_token 00092 input = regex.sub("[[A-Za-z]+]", mask, input) 00093 return input 00094

section.title: extractPreAndPost()

para.para: Returns the word before the error and the next word after the error.

entry.para: The complete input given by the user

section.para: Definition at line 125 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00125 def extractPreAndPost(self, input): 00126 """! Returns the word before the error and the next word after the error. 00127 @param input The complete input given by the user 00128 """ 00129 beforeAndAfter = input.split("[" + str(self.contextError) + "]") 00130 before = beforeAndAfter[0] 00131 after = beforeAndAfter[1] 00132 pre, post = "", "" 00133 if len(before) > 2: 00134 pre = before.split(" ")[-2] 00135 if pre[:-1] == ",": 00136 post = post[:-1] 00137 if len(after) > 2: 00138 post = after.split(" ")[1] 00139 for char in post: 00140 if char in "?.!/;:": 00141 post = post.replace(char, "") 00142 return pre, post 00143

section.programlisting: 00119 def extractWord(self, input): 00120 """! Returns only the contents of [*] contained within the input given by the user. 00121 @param input The complete input given by the user 00122 """ 00123 return input[input.find("[") + 1 : input.find("]")] 00124

section.title: getEditDistance()

para.para: Returns the edit distance between the original word and the string compared.

entry.para: The original word given by the user
The string to be compared to the original word

section.para: Definition at line 147 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00147 def getEditDistance(self, originalWord, stringCompared): 00148 """! Returns the edit distance between the original word and the string compared. 00149 @param originalWord The original word given by the user 00150 @param stringCompared The string to be compared to the original word 00151 """ 00152 if len(originalWord) < len(stringCompared): 00153 return self.getEditDistance(stringCompared, originalWord) 00154 # When the originalWord is longer than the word to be compared with 00155 if len(stringCompared) == 0: 00156 return len(originalWord) 00157 previousRow = range(len(stringCompared) + 1) 00158 for originalWordindex, charOne in enumerate(originalWord): 00159 currentRow = [originalWordindex + 1] 00160 for comparedWordIndex, charTwo in enumerate(stringCompared): 00161 insertions = previous_row[comparedWordIndex + 1] + 1 00162 deletions = currentRow[comparedWordIndex] + 1 00163 substitutions = previous_row[comparedWordIndex] + (charOne != charTwo) 00164 currentRow.append(min(insertions, deletions, substitutions)) 00165 previous_row = currentRow 00166 return previous_row[-1] 00167

section.title: getEditDistanceList()

para.para: Returns a list of the all potential words with the edit distances between the potential word and the original error.

section.para: Definition at line 168 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00168 def getEditDistanceList(self): 00169 """! Returns a list of the all potential words with the edit distances between the potential word and the original error.""" 00170 synsetList = self.modelResultsSynset 00171 originalWord = self.contextError 00172 editDistances = [] 00173 for word in synsetList: 00174 distance = self.shortGetEditDistance(originalWord, word) 00175 editDistances.append(distance) 00176 combinedList = list(zip(synsetList, editDistances)) 00177 return combinedList 00178

section.title: getSynsets()

para.para: Loads and Returns the model for use by the program from hugginface.com.

section.para: Definition at line 196 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00196 def getSynsets(self, guessedWords): 00197 """! Loads and Returns the model for use by the program from hugginface.com. 00198 @param guessedWords A list of potential Guesses 00199 """ 00200 guesses = set() 00201 wordList = set() 00202 for guess in guessedWords: 00203 guesses.add(guess) 00204 for guess in guesses: 00205 wordList.add(guess) 00206 synsets = self.wordNet.synsets(guess) 00207 for synset in synsets: 00208 for lemma in synset.lemmas(): 00209 print(str(lemma.name()) + ", ", end=" ") 00210 wordList.add(lemma.name().strip().replace("_", " ").lower()) 00211 return wordList 00212

section.title: processInput()

para.para: Main functionality of the program that processes the input given by the user.

section.para:
@type input: str
Parameters
input
The complete input given by the user
Definition at line 240 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00240 def processInput(self, input: str): 00241 """! Main functionality of the program that processes the input given by the user. 00242 @type input: str 00243 @param input The complete input given by the user 00244 """ 00245 if self.containsError(input): 00246 # gets the word that is the error 00247 self.contextError = self.extractWord(input) 00248 # get word before the error and after the error 00249 self.preWord, self.postWord = self.extractPreAndPost(input) 00250 # replaces the error with an appropriate mask 00251 self.maskedInput = self.addMask(input) 00252 # get the model predictions 00253 self.modelResults = self.getModelPredictions(self.maskedInput) 00254 self.modelResultsSynset = [] 00255 # for each prediction made: 00256 for prediction in self.modelResults: 00257 # gets the predicted word 00258 prediction = prediction.get("token_str").strip() 00259 # creates a list of three words to create two bigrams for comparison 00260 bigramRawInputList = [] 00261 bigramRawInputList.append(self.preWord) 00262 bigramRawInputList.append(prediction) 00263 bigramRawInputList.append(self.postWord) 00264 bigramList = list(nltk.bigrams(bigramRawInputList)) 00265 bigramJoinedList = [] 00266 # joins words with a space for each bigram 00267 for bigram in bigramList: 00268 bigram = " ".join(bigram) 00269 bigramJoinedList.append(bigram) 00270 bigramFinalList = bigramJoinedList[:] 00271 bigramFinalList.append(prediction) 00272 # gets the synsets for each bigram in the list 00273 bigramListResults = self.getSynsets(bigramFinalList) 00274 # Filter out the bigrams only 00275 for word in list(bigramListResults): 00276 for bigram in bigramJoinedList: 00277 if word == bigram: 00278 bigramListResults.remove(word) 00279 # appends the synsets to the full list of synsets 00280 for result in bigramListResults: 00281 self.modelResultsSynset.append(result) 00282 00283 # Filter out any duplicates that may be present 00284 self.modelResultsSynset = list(set(self.modelResultsSynset)) 00285 # returns a set of lists that adds the edit distance to each word in the set 00286 self.editDistances = self.getEditDistanceList() 00287 # sorts the list according to the edit distance in ascending order 00288 self.sortEditDistances() 00289 # Return the top 10 results by shortest edit distance compared to the error 00290 return self.editDistances[:10] 00291 else: 00292 pass 00293

section.title: shortGetEditDistance()

para.para: Gets the edit distance required to change strignCompared into original Word using the levenshtein method.

entry.para: The word to be compared to
The word to be compared to the original word

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: The edit distance between the two words

section.para: Definition at line 294 of file Controller.py.
section.programlisting: 00294 def shortGetEditDistance(self, originalWord, stringCompared): 00295 """! Gets the edit distance required to change strignCompared into original Word using the levenshtein method 00296 @param originalWord The word to be compared to 00297 @param stringCompared The word to be compared to the original word 00298 @return The edit distance between the two words 00299 """ 00300 originalWord = originalWord.lower() 00301 stringCompared = stringCompared.lower() 00302 distance = leven.distance(originalWord, stringCompared) 00303 return distance 00304
